plugin.description: A set of common procedures for Deploy use-cases
plugin.author: CloudBees
plugin.detailedDescription:
The EC-Utilities plugin provides CloudBees CD procedures you can use to perform the following operations:
* Decommission environments: This procedure allows users to create a process step easily using utility procedure which will tear down all the dynamically created environments. This procedure can work in the context of either Pipeline or a Job (Process or Procedure). * Create a schedule to trigger gate: This procedure allows users to create a stage gate that is triggered by a schedule. The idea is to prevent a stage to start before a specific date and time.
